character.statement: Let's go! We've got to escape!
Let's go! We've got to escape!
I'm Ramen bot. I can't wait for dinner time!
Help us! The Q-bots are destroying the city.
Whatchu lookin at? Oh this trailer. Check it out!
This is the facility where I make all of my robots.
I'm hairbrush bot. I can style any hair.
I'm toothbrush bot. I'm minty and fresh.
